mapper.insert: insert into sc_sys_status_log (id, pmid, `date`, `type`, excessive_stop, creat_time, create_user_id, create_user_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{excessiveStop,jdbcType=REAL}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sc_sys_status_log set pmid = #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, excessive_stop = #{excessiveStop,jdbcType=REAL}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pmid, `date`, `type`, excessive_stop, creat_time, create_user_id, create_user_name from sc_sys_status_log
select id, pmid, `date`, `type`, excessive_stop, creat_time, create_user_id, create_user_name from sc_sys_status_log where pmid = #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id desc
